headline: NextDecade Approves Final Investment Decision for Train 5 at Rio Grande LNG Project
summary: NextDecade Corporation (NASDAQ:NEXT) is one of the Reddit stocks that will go to the moon. On October 16, NextDecade Corporation announced that it had achieved a positive final investment decision/FID on Train 5 at the Rio Grande LNG project. Concurrently, the company successfully closed financial transactions to fully fund Train 5 and its related infrastructure […]
